472490.name: Istrolid - Paint Job
472490.description:
Take your creativity and unique visual style to the next level by giving your fleet a Paint Job!
This is our first set of cosmetic upgrades for players who want to help support development of the game. It includes a range of decals you can add to your ship, such as stripes, letters, numbers, and symbols that can go over the top of amor and batteries. Paint your ships any way you like so that everyone knows exactly whose they are when you field them.

Anyone who supports us by buying a DLC also gets bonus features, including the ability name and search their ship list, and to rotate all armor pieces and wings!
